Although India has played its initial group games on challenging pitches in Mumbai and Delhi, the Super 8 matches in Sri Lanka are anticipated to be the toughest.
is renowned for its slow, turning tracks that favour "tweakers." Indian batters have already shown some vulnerability against slow spin in the group stages, which may be exploited here
Unlike the bouncy, batter-friendly surfaces seen at the
requires extreme patience and technical adaptability
